parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For more information about resource groups, see Resource groups.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the whitelist template. You can call the DescribeAllWhitelistTemplate operation to obtain the ID of the whitelist template.
